data.comment: Vanja Milinkovic-Savic (Torino) is shown a red card without being on the pitch!
The first-half is now underway.
The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Torino.
In the minute 4, It's advantage Torino in Turin as Andrea Belotti scores from the spot to make it 1-0.
Federico La Penna blows against Torino's Andrea Belotti for offside.
Federico La Penna signals a free kick to Cagliari.
In the minute 7, Free kick for Torino in the half of Cagliari.
Federico La Penna signals a free kick to Cagliari in their own half.
Razvan Marin for Cagliari drives towards goal at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 9, In Turin Cagliari attack through Giovanni Simeone. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Torino goal kick.
Free kick for Cagliari in their own half.
In the minute 11, Corner awarded to Cagliari.
Joao Pedro gets an equalizer for Cagliari. The score is now 1-1.
Sebastian Walukiewicz instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 14, Can Torino get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cagliari's half?
Throw-in for Torino in the half of Cagliari.
In Turin a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 16, Torino to take a throw-in in Cagliari territory.
Federico La Penna awards the home team a throw-in.
Torino awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 19, Federico La Penna signals a free kick to Cagliari in their own half.
Goal! Cagliari have got their heads in front thanks to a Giovanni Simeone strike.
That's a fine assist from Nahitan Nandez.
In the minute 20, Cagliari awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Torino awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Cagliari in their own half.
In the minute 22, Free kick Torino.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Torino capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Cagliari's half?
In the minute 26, Free kick for Torino in their own half.
Goal kick for Cagliari at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino.
Free kick for Torino in the half of Cagliari.
In the minute 27, Ricardo Rodriguez gets his shot on target but fails to score for Torino.
Throw-in high up the field for Cagliari in Turin.
Cagliari have been awarded a corner by Federico La Penna.
In the minute 29, In Turin Cagliari drive forward through Riccardo Sottil. His shot is on target but it's saved.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Turin.
Cagliari awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 31, Tomas Rincon for Torino has been booked by Federico La Penna and receives a first yellow card.
Cagliari's Marko Rog has been booked in Turin.
Ball safe as Torino is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 33, Tomas Rincon is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Torino needs to be cautious. Cagliari have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Cagliari at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino.
In the minute 35, Torino's Tomas Rincon is back in action after a slight knock.
Throw-in Cagliari.
Cagliari push upfield but Federico La Penna quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 38, In Turin a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Cagliari are whistled for offside.
Cagliari have been awarded a corner by Federico La Penna.
In the minute 41, Torino have a goal kick.
Riccardo Sottil of Cagliari gets in a strike, but is off target.
Federico La Penna awards Torino a goal kick.
In the minute 43, Federico La Penna signals a Torino throw-in in Cagliari's half.
Throw-in Cagliari.
Cagliari will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Torino.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Cagliari in their own half.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Federico La Penna signals a free kick to Cagliari in their own half.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Turin.
The second-half is now underway.
Corner awarded to Cagliari.
In the minute 46, Federico La Penna signals a throw-in for Cagliari, close to Torino's area.
Throw-in for Cagliari in their own half.
In the minute 48, Cagliari’s Giovanni Simeone is on his feet again at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino.
The match at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino has been interrupted briefly for a check on Giovanni Simeone, who is down injured.
Goal! Andrea Belotti levels the match at 2-2.
Great play from Federico Bonazzoli to set up the goal.
In the minute 51, It's a goal kick for the home team in Turin.
Federico La Penna signals a free kick to Cagliari in their own half.
Torino's Soualiho Meite gets in a shot on goal at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 53, Free kick for Cagliari in their own half.
Throw-in for Cagliari close to the penalty box.
Cagliari have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 56, Federico La Penna signals a throw-in for Cagliari, close to Torino's area.
Torino awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Torino awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 58, Throw-in for Torino close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to Torino.
Tomas Rincon for Torino gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 59, Federico La Penna awards Cagliari a goal kick.
Throw-in for Cagliari at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino.
Attention is being given to Cagliari’s Joao Pedro and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 61, Cagliari's Joao Pedro looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Throw-in for Torino in the half of Cagliari.
Federico La Penna signals a Cagliari throw-in in Torino's half.
In the minute 63, Cagliari's Riccardo Sottil gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Torino have a goal kick.
In the minute 64, Throw-in high up the field for Cagliari in Turin.
Federico Bonazzoli (Torino) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Free kick Cagliari.
Cagliari advance rapidly upfield but Federico La Penna blows for offside.
In the minute 66, Free kick for Cagliari in their own half.
Ball safe as Cagliari is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Riccardo Sottil (Cagliari) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 67, Torino awarded a free kick in their own half.
Federico La Penna signals a free kick to Torino in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 70, Torino's Federico Bonazzoli gets in a shot on goal at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Torino's Soualiho Meite breaks free at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Cagliari goal kick.
In the minute 71, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Cagliari close to the penalty box.
Torino needs to be cautious. Cagliari have an attacking throw-in.
Giovanni Simeone puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 2-3.
In the minute 75, Torino to take a throw-in in Cagliari territory.
At Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino, Babis Lykogiannis has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Tomas Rincon has recovered and rejoins the match in Turin.
Federico La Penna waits before resuming play because Tomas Rincon for Torino is still down.
In the minute 76, Leonardo Pavoletti is replacing Giovanni Simeone for the away team.
Cagliari have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 77, Can Torino get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cagliari's half?
Federico La Penna awards the away team a throw-in.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Turin to check on Andrea Belotti, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 79, Torino make their first substitution with Simone Verdi replacing Soualiho Meite.
The home team replace Mergim Vojvoda with Wilfried Stephane Singo.
Andrea Belotti returns to the field for Torino after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 80, Federico La Penna signals a free kick to Torino in their own half.
Federico La Penna signals a Torino throw-in in Cagliari's half.
Can Torino capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Cagliari's half?
In the minute 83, Andrea Belotti's header is off-target for Torino.
Goal kick for Cagliari at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino.
Leonardo Pavoletti of Cagliari is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 84, The away team have replaced Riccardo Sottil with Adam Ounas. This is the second substitution made today by Eusebio Di Francesco.
Free kick in a good position for Torino!
Fabrizio Caligara is replacing Joao Pedro for Cagliari at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino.
In the minute 87, Torino have been awarded a corner by Federico La Penna.
Free kick for Torino in the half of Cagliari.
Throw-in Cagliari.
In the minute 88, Marco Giampaolo is making the team's third substitution at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino with Cristian Ansaldi replacing Karol Linetty.
Marco Giampaolo (Torino) is making a fourth substitution, with Nicola Murru replacing Ricardo Rodriguez.
In the minute 89, Free kick for Torino in their own half.
Leonardo Pavoletti is booked for the away team.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Cagliari have a goal kick.
Cagliari awarded a free kick in their own half.
Torino's Simone Verdi misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Cagliari at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino.
Andrea Belotti for Torino drives towards goal at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Torino in their own half.
Throw-in for Torino in the half of Cagliari.
Throw-in for Torino at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino.
It's 2-3 as the referee blows for full-time.
Ragnar Klavan is on a sub for Marko Rog for Cagliari.
